JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are looking for new employees, for our customer in their warehouse in Vejle

 

The job

As an employee in this warehouse, your primary task will be to pick and pack goods for supermarkets throughout the country.

We are looking for employees for the cold storage, where the temperature is 2 degrees celsius. You will be using a voice-controlled system and an electrical stabler to do this job. You will be part of a dynamic and active environment with a good atmosphere and great team spirit.

The task is picking and packing with pick by voice.

 

About you

You are motivated to work, thrive in active work, and have a positive approach to your work tasks. You thrive with an active working day, have an open and positive attitude, and knowing the level of detail when the pace increases. It´s also important that you can maintain an overview in busy and hectic situations during the day.

In addition, we expect you to:

  • to thrive in a sometimes-busy work environment.
  • like to work in a fast pace.
  • speak Danish or English.
  • have experience from similar work - but not a requirement.

Practical information

Working hours during the day shift is 06:00 - 14:15 in the weekdays. Your shift entails a 45-minute break, and the shifts are distributed from Monday to Sunday - minus Saturday.

Salary:
134,92kr + 9 % in fritvalg

Sundays + 58.80kr

Does this sound interesting?

Click on 'Søg jobbet' to write your application.

If you do not already have a profile at Moment, you will be asked to create one as the first step in the application process.

We look forward to receiving your application.
